name: TheSafetyOfNumbers
description:
This is a project made for the trijam.

it was made in the 3 hours with 2 hours on first day and 1 hour on the second.

the thumbnail, project page and "Screenshots" were made after the 3 hours.

Check back here when i post my video on how i made the game.

Play Game in fullscreen.
